entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
